wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Luke Harrison (born 3 February 1992 in Bath, Somerset) is an English cricketer active in 2013 who plays for Worcestershire. He has appeared in three first-class matches as a right handed batsman who bowls right arm medium pace.

response: Nicholas or Nick Harrison may refer to:
*Nick Harrison (racing) (1982–2019), American stock car racing crew chief
*Nick Harrison (Shortland Street),  a character on Shortland Street
